p.k: A look at the life and career of Donald Sutherland, the Canadian actor whose credits include The Dirty Dozen, M_A_S_H, Pride & Prejudice and The Hunger Games
Movie experts reflect on the career of Dirk Bogarde, the great English actor known for his complex roles in the dark films Victim, Death in Venice and The Night Porter
Schumann Scenes From Faust. New. For his first concert as music director of the Orchestre de Paris, Daniel Harding explores Schumann's work Scenes from Goethe's Faust
Last Bottle In The World Kyros plans on giving his wife a priceless bottle of wine for their anniversary. But he has no intention of drinking to her health
Kindly Dig Your Grave The unscrupulous Madame La Grue runs an art gallery, exploiting young artists. But she finally gets her comeuppance
Completely Foolproof Wealthy New Yorker Joe Brisson is a self-made man with a plan to kill his disgruntled wife. Unfortunately for
There's One Born Every Minute Arthur and Margaret are a quiet couple. When Margaret inherits ?50,000, Arthur reluctantly agrees to gamble
Bosom Friends Nell and Emma are old friends who are reunited after years apart. However, things turn sour when the penniless Emma looks
Elaine Paige stars in Andrew Lloyd Webber's world-famous musical. A group of cats gather to choose one lucky feline, who will go to a magical place to be reborn
An intimate profile of Julie Christie, the acclaimed British actress who has won the Academy, Golden Globe, BAFTA and Screen Actors Guild awards
A fascinating look at the life and career of actress Carole Lombard, who starred in a host of comedic films during the 1930s but died in a tragic plane accident in 1942
A portrait of actor Robert Duvall, who has starred in an array of iconic films and TV projects, including To Kill a Mockingbird, Apocalypse Now and The Godfather
A fascinating look at the life and career of Jack Nicholson, the Oscar-winning actor whose film credits include Easy Rider, The Shining, A Few Good Men and The Departed
Movie experts look back at the life and career of Jane Fonda, who won Oscars for her performances in both neo-noir crime-thriller Klute and wartime drama Coming Home

p.n: Bob Marley Live At The Rainbow
p.k: Shortly after Bob Marley released his 1977 album Exodus, he performed at London's famous Rainbow Theatre. Set highlights include I Shot The Sheriff, Lively
A treat for all Queen fans as Freddie, Brian, John and Roger perform early hits such as Killer Queen and Seven Seas of Rhye at the Rainbow Theatre in London in 1974
With archive footage of interviews, concerts and personal material, this award-winning documentary offers a compelling insight into the solo work of Freddie Mercury
